original_text: Everybody ate and they all had enough food. They were not hungry any more. Then the disciples picked up the bits of food that people had not eaten. They filled 12 baskets with all the little bits of food.
korean_text: 먹고 다 배불렀더라 그 남은 조각을 열두 바구니에 거두니라

sentences.original_text: and they all had enough food
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 모두 충분한 음식을 가졌다

sentences.original_text: They were not hungry any more
the bits of food that people had not eaten
with all the little bits of food
